mapper.select: select cm.t_menu_id, cm.t_parent_id, cm.t_menu_url, cm.t_menu_resources, cm.t_menu_name, cm.t_menu_type, cm.t_menu_remarks, cm.t_menu_sort_no, cm.t_create_time, cm.t_update_time from codeworld_menu cm left join codeworld_role_menu crm on crm.t_menu_id = cm.t_menu_id where crm.t_role_id = #{roleId}
select cm.t_menu_id,cm.t_menu_type from codeworld_menu AS cm where t_menu_id = #{id}
select cm.t_menu_id from codeworld_menu cm where t_parent_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update codeworld_menu set t_menu_url = #{url}, t_menu_resources = #{resources}, t_menu_name = #{title}, t_menu_type = #{type}, t_menu_remarks = #{remarks}, t_menu_sort_no = #{sortNo}, t_update_time = #{updateTime} where t_menu_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_menu ( t_menu_id, t_parent_id , t_menu_url , t_menu_resources, t_menu_name , t_menu_type, t_menu_remarks , t_menu_sort_no , t_create_time , t_update_time ) values (#{id},#{parentId},#{url},#{resources},#{title},#{type},#{remarks},#{sortNo},#{createTime},#{updateTime});
insert into codeworld_role_menu ( t_role_menu_id, t_role_id, t_menu_id, t_create_time, t_update_time ) values (#{roleMenuId},#{roleId},#{menuId},#{createTime},#{updateTime});
